title: Structural Analysis Engineer
description:
About the job
            

            
                
                  Do you have a solid background in structural design? Are you skilled in developing various structural calculations for maritime projects and are you looking for a new position in the Netherlands? If so, we would like to get in touch with you!Function:As a Structural Engineer, you will be responsible mainly for structural calculations, starting from construction plans up to detailed calculations of ship structures and integrated foundations. The role implies the full engineering process from basic to detailed engineering.Specific duties in this role include:      Performing stiffness, vibrations, buckling, fatigue, strength and FEM calculationsPreparing and checking construction plans for vessels hulls and other complex structuresSupporting and guiding the structural engineers in preparing the 2D & 3D drawingAttending technical meetings with clients, classification societies, suppliers and other third parties.
Requirements:      Bachelor or Master degree in Naval Architecture, Mechanical Engineering, Aerospace Engineering, or related field.At least 3 years ship structures experience gained in the shipbuilding or offshore industry.Familiarity with ship class calculations and tools such as DNV-GL Nauticus Hull, LR-SSC, or BV MARS2000.Proficiency in FEM modelling and analysis software such as ANSYS, NX, or FEMAP, and CAD systems such as NUPAS (3D), 3DX, or Catia.Excellent communication skills in English, both written and spoken.
Offer:      A perfect opportunity to grow and develop your professional career in the Netherlands.38 holiday days per year.The base salary for this position depends on your experience and capabilities.Assistance to candidates who relocate to the Netherlands.Excellent training and development opportunities within the company.
Company:Our client is a company active in the shipbuilding industry. They design and build various types of ships and they are well-known by their high-quality products. Our client offers an international and professional working environment.Are you enthusiastic and ready for this challenge for? Apply directly via the application button below or by e-mail elena@upeople.nl. If you have any questions, you can contact Elena Olteanu by phone or WhatsApp +316 30111222. Your details will be treated confidentially!

We are highly specialized in the Marine & Offshore industry and cross border employment. We maintain valuable contacts with the leading companies in the Marine & Offshore industry. For our (international) clients we are continuously looking for Engineering professionals for long term projects or permanent jobs within the Shipbuilding, Yachtbuilding and Offshore Industry.
